definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: disappear, vanish (si vera 1., cf. As. pasâsu, do away, blot out (esp. sins));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[פַּסּוּ מִן]] Ps 12:2 the faithful have vanished (Che Dr) from (among)…men ; Lag:Proph. Chald. xivi Gr We Du read [[אָֽפְסוּ]] (Is 16:4).
